text:
Hartmut Nickel (16 November 1944 – 27 June 2019) was a German ice hockey player. He played for SC Dynamo Berlin from 1963 to 1974. He competed for the East Germany national team at the 1968 Winter Olympics in Grenoble.
Nickel was born in Weißwasser, Saxony. He died on 27 June 2019, at the age of 74.
